document_data.mainbody:
Mytura Shebala was a warrior-priest of Tyr who headed the Temple of Tyr in Bezantur, Thay during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Mytura had been a mercenary, but dedicated her life to Tyr after experiencing a vision of him during a battle. By the late 1360s DR, she led a small congregation of Tyrran worshipers in Bezantur&mdasha place generally disinterested in lawful gods like Tyr&mdashand had a dozen warrior-priests who reported to her.
